title: To be of use parlor generals

content.prompt: In the poem, the term “parlor generals” (line 15) most probably refers to individuals who

choices.label: behave with unrelenting valor on the battlefield
have retired from illustrious careers, only to be forgotten
have performed deeds because they sought public praise
hold forth as experts on work they have never accomplished

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
